Question: What did the policemen do when they heard a cry from a distance?
Options: A. run away B. hurry along C. fine motorists D. direct traffic E. help

The policemen did help when they heard a cry from a distance. This is the correct answer. They may have responded to the call and gone to the scene of the incident to provide assistance or investigate. The other options are incorrect because they do not describe what the policemen would typically do in this situation.

Options: A. run away B. hurry along C. fine motorists D. direct traffic E. help
